Index:

--- 
+++ 
@@ -0,0 +1,38 @@
+// path: frontend/src/api/client/apiConfig.js
+export const API_CONFIG = {
+    BASE_URL: import.meta.env.VITE_API_URL || 'http://localhost:8000/api',
+    TIMEOUT: 10000,
+    ENDPOINTS: {
+        BILL: {
+            BASE: '/bill',
+            ANALYZE: '/bill/analyze/',          // Added trailing slash
+            GET: '/bill/details/',              // Added trailing slash
+            VALIDATE: '/bill/validate/',        // Added trailing slash
+            HISTORY: '/bill/history/'           // Added trailing slash
+        },
+        QUOTE: {
+            BASE: '',
+            GENERATE: '/quote/generate/',       // Added trailing slash
+            GET: '/quote/details/',             // Added trailing slash
+            SAVE: '/quote/save/'                // Added trailing slash
+        },
+        AUTH: {
+            LOGIN: '/auth/login/',              // Added auth endpoints
+            REFRESH: '/auth/refresh/'
+        }
+    },
+    HEADERS: {
+        'Content-Type': 'application/json',
+        'Accept': 'application/json'
+    }
+};
+
+export const HTTP_STATUS = {
+    OK: 200,
+    CREATED: 201,
+    BAD_REQUEST: 400,
+    UNAUTHORIZED: 401,
+    FORBIDDEN: 403,
+    NOT_FOUND: 404,
+    INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR: 500
+};
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,38 @@
+// path: frontend/src/api/client/apiConfig.js
+export const API_CONFIG = {
+    BASE_URL: import.meta.env.VITE_API_URL || 'http://localhost:8000/api',
+    TIMEOUT: 10000,
+    ENDPOINTS: {
+        BILL: {
+            BASE: '/bill',
+            ANALYZE: '/analyze/',          // Added trailing slash
+            GET: '/details/',              // Added trailing slash
+            VALIDATE: '/validate/',        // Added trailing slash
+            HISTORY: '/history/'           // Added trailing slash
+        },
+        QUOTE: {
+            BASE: '/quote',
+            GENERATE: '/generate/',       // Added trailing slash
+            GET: '/details/',             // Added trailing slash
+            SAVE: '/save/'                // Added trailing slash
+        },
+        AUTH: {
+            LOGIN: '/auth/login/',              // Added auth endpoints
+            REFRESH: '/auth/refresh/'
+        }
+    },
+    HEADERS: {
+        'Content-Type': 'application/json',
+        'Accept': 'application/json'
+    }
+};
+
+export const HTTP_STATUS = {
+    OK: 200,
+    CREATED: 201,
+    BAD_REQUEST: 400,
+    UNAUTHORIZED: 401,
+    FORBIDDEN: 403,
+    NOT_FOUND: 404,
+    INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR: 500
+};
\ No newline at end of file
